column4: what are you trying to play? a video file? an audio file? a network stream?
i am trying to play a reagular dvd on my dvd rom drive and tried to play a .avi file i downloaded.  Both failed in VLC.
definitely give mplayer a spin - it supports just about any codec there is
when i righ click and open my .avi file with mplayer it gives me the following error.."Could not read from resource."
